explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning algorithms for vulnerability severity prediction (VSP).
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on supervised learning techniques for classification tasks in VSP.
explanations.classification: The paper evaluates the performance of models using standard classification metrics like precision, recall, and F-measure.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of deep neural networks as one of the machine learning algorithms evaluated.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep neural networks, which are a part of deep learning techniques.
explanations.deep neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of deep neural networks in the evaluation of VSP models.
explanations.logistic regression: The paper includes logistic regression as one of the machine learning algorithms assessed.
explanations.random forest: The paper includes random forest as one of the machine learning algorithms assessed.
